name: SegmentGroup.Root
description: Organizes and navigates between sections in a view.
description_zh: Organizes and navigates between sections in a view.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the radio group when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control the state of the radio group.
defaultValue.description_zh:
首次渲染单选按钮组时的初始值。
当您不需要控制单选组的状态时使用。

disabled.description: If `true`, the radio group will be disabled
disabled.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则单选组将被禁用

form.description: The associate form of the underlying input.
form.description_zh: 基础输入的 associate 形式。

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  label: string
  indicator: string
  item(value: string): string
  itemLabel(value: string): string
  itemControl(value: string): string
  itemHiddenInput(value: string): string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the radio. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: radio 中元素的 id。对合成很有用。

name.description:
The name of the input fields in the radio
(Useful for form submission).
name.description_zh:
单选按钮中输入字段的名称
（用于表单提交）。

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: The callback fired when the model value changes.
events.description_zh: 当 model 值更改时触发回调。

events.name: valueChange
events.description: Function called once a radio is checked
events.description_zh: 检查无线电后调用的函数
